name: Waveball
description:
WINNER OF GLITCH'S "NEON NOIR" DIVERSIFIER FOR GLOBAL GAME JAM 2017

Use your Supersonic Wave-Emitter to fire dodgeballs and frag your opponents in this fast, chaotic, and fun local multiplayer battle!

XBOX CONTROLLERS REQUIRED

Developed by:

Austin Lewer - Art 

Tristan Mansfield - Music

Ryan Vanden Boomen - Design/Programming

Shane Yach - Programming/Design
